title: Feeding Lane Because She Wasn't Given A Good Leash.
body:
I was playing a normals game and was leashing FarKicker14432. My support **ACCIDENTALLY** over stayed, causing FartKicker14432 (Kindred) to not reach level 2, and because of this she fed bot lane. After these events, a series of negative words were thrown at me and my support. The 0/16/0 Kindred was reported by everyone on the team, and we hope Rito games will either ban her, or demote her. People like FartKicker14432 are the bane of League Of Legends.
_
Thank you for reading this, and taking it into account

replies.body: don't name and shame etc etc so on so forth

Next time just send a support ticket, don't name and shame on boards. Also, all of us regular GDers/Boards users see these complaints here all the time and we all experience our fair share in games too, we don't need anymore :) Support ticket will get you what you need, posting on Boards will accomplish very little. (Y)

> [{quoted}](name=Olee,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=XwchLjFm,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-12-10T23:25:32.045+0000)
>
> Next

Sup buttercup?

My last day of work for the year!!! Supper busy as you can tell ;-S

> [{quoted}](name=Olee,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=XwchLjFm,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2015-12-11T00:15:22.253+0000)
>
> roflwat

Give me a reply to talk about :(
Send in a support ticket with evidence if you want anything actually done with it. Even then it's a long shot.
looking at oce.op.gg hes definitely just a feeder definitely deserves a Ban hammer, hopefully when rito decide to close this thread they will actually review his stats and ban him accordingly
He told me to go ahead, so I did :/
